name: Integration Plugin for Pagely Resellers
author: joshua.strebel Pagely

sections.description:
The new reseller plugin for the pagely WordPress hosting system.
Report Bugs here if you want them addressed.
sections.changelog:
3.3.0

New flow for accepting orders based on recent API changes

3.1.7

Security related changes, and removed PayPal payment option for now.

3.1.6

Security related changes

3.1.5

new options page class, and options

3.1.4

Added additional client ip header to API calls. Allow for plugin options page to me moved under the Settings Menu.

3.1.3

Cache buster for .js enqueued files.

3.1.2

Proper use of nounces, some code cleanup.

3.1.1

A bit of code cleanup.

3.1.0

Removed the mobile form field and consolidated the first and last name.

3.0.9

Bug in get transients, append reseller id to calls.

3.0.8

javascript redirect

3.0.6

Commit image, minor bug fixes

3.0.2

All new, utilizes our new Partner API. View docs for usage intructions.

2.0.4

Wiped it

2.0.3

API Keys were not being accepted properly

2.0.2

Constants were colliding

2.0.1

Fixed hash

2.0

All new.

1.6

General Bug fixes

1.5

  • LIVE

1.3b

  • Added Documentation .pdf to /assets folder and universal products

1.2b

  • Display fix, tested 2.8.5

1.1b

  • Add Support Topics to bottom main plugin page.

1.0b

  • Service is now active. Accepting a limited number of Applications for extended live beta.

.06.2b

  • TEST MODE ONLY

  • TEST MODE ONLY

.05.4

  • cURL via SSL TEST MODE ONLY

.05.1

  • Tweeks TEST MODE ONLY

.05

.03
